entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow beginning late this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:51 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
